results.title: Low-dose poly(ADP-ribose) polymerase inhibitor-containing combination therapies reverse early peripheral diabetic neuropathy.
results.text_hl: With @CHEMICAL_1_5_dihydroxyisoquinoline @CHEMICAL_MESH:C095653 @@@ISO@@@ plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@LIS@@@, no significant correction of MNCV was observed, and the effect on @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@thermal hyperalgesia@@@ was quite modest.

citations.NLM: Li F, Drel VR, Szabó C, Stevens MJ, Obrosova IG. Low-dose poly(ADP-ribose) polymerase inhibitor-containing combination therapies reverse early peripheral diabetic neuropathy. Diabetes. 2005 May;54(5):1514-22. PMID: 15855340
citations.BibTeX: @article{15855340, title={Low-dose poly(ADP-ribose) polymerase inhibitor-containing combination therapies reverse early peripheral diabetic neuropathy.}, author={Li F and Drel VR and Szabó C and Stevens MJ and Obrosova IG}, journal={Diabetes}, volume={54}, number={5}, pages={1514-22}}

results.title: Involvement of 5-hydroxytryptamine and bradykinin in the hyperalgesia induced in rats by collagenase from Clostridium histolyticum.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ (10(-5) M), and angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor, increased the duration of the @<m>DISEASE_Hyperalgesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@hyperalgesia@@@ elicited in normal @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Damas J, Liégeois JF, Bourdon V. Involvement of 5-hydroxytryptamine and bradykinin in the hyperalgesia induced in rats by collagenase from Clostridium histolyticum. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 1997 May;355(5):566-70. PMID: 9151293
citations.BibTeX: @article{9151293, title={Involvement of 5-hydroxytryptamine and bradykinin in the hyperalgesia induced in rats by collagenase from Clostridium histolyticum.}, author={Damas J and Liégeois JF and Bourdon V}, journal={Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol}, volume={355}, number={5}, pages={566-70}}
